room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Wow!!! Just Wow! My family has done escape rooms around the world and the theming and experience of Time Machine was magic! The puzzles are multi-linear, so there was always something for everyone to work on, and the multi-room puzzles required top tier communication. There were many types of puzzles and it took our entire group to get through. Bring your A game to this room! We made it out before we were toast!

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Loved doing the fair room and the time machine! Zach was an incredible game master! Can't wait to come back and conquer the rest of the rooms! Thank you so much Zach!
